RestoreLightValue1.En: Restored <color=yellow>{0}</color> Light Value, Light Value is overflowing
RestoreLightValue1.Ch: 已回复 <color=yellow>{0}</color> 光照值，光照值满溢了

Status_LightCage_Prison.En: The Lightcage has prisoned {0} Light Value
Status_LightCage_Prison.Ch: 光之囚笼已囚禁 {0} 光照值

Status_BK_NoSV.En: {0} failed to restore Shadow Value due to Breakdown
Status_BK_NoSV.Ch: {0} 由于Breakdown状态无法回复暗影值

Shield_Resist1.Ch: {0}的 <color=#C6C6C6>护盾</color> 抵消了本次伤害

Shield_Resist2.Ch: {0}的 <color=#C6C6C6>护盾</color> 抵消了 {1} 伤害

LightValue_NotEnough.En: The Light Value is not enough!

LightValue_Return.En: Previously used Skill Stone returned {0} Light Value
LightValue_Return.Ch: 上一个使用的技能石返还了 {0} 光照值

Heal_Over.Ch: 治疗溢出，已返还 {0} 光照值

Charge_Max.En: The Charge Level of {0} has reached to Lv. 3 and cannot be charged anymore
Charge_Max.Ch: {0} 的充能等级已达到3级，无法再继续充能

Tide_Trigger.En: Shadow Tide triggered, {0} 's Shadow Value, DMG and All DMG DEF are significantly increased for {1} rounds
Tide_Trigger.Ch: 暗影回潮已触发，{0}的暗影值，全伤害与全伤害减免在{1}回合内大幅提高了

Tide_Invalid.En: Shadow Tide ended and is no longer available in this combat
Tide_Invalid.Ch: 暗影回潮已结束，且在本次战斗中不再可用

BK_Enter.En: {0} is caught in Breakdown, all DMG Defence within 1 round are dramatically decreased
BK_Enter.Ch: {0}陷入了Breakdown状态，1回合内受到的全伤害大幅提高了

Spy_Atk1Des.En: Conducts a sneak attack, deals 100% * ATK Physical DMG.
Spy_Atk1Des.Ch: 进行一次偷袭，造成攻击力100%的物理伤害。

Spy_Atk2Des.En: Hurls a shadow-contaminated stone, deals 80% * ATK Physical DMG and reduces the ATK of target (Unstackable DEBUFF) by 20% for 2 rounds.
Spy_Atk2Des.Ch: 投掷出被暗影缠绕的石头，造成80%攻击力的物理伤害，并降低目标20%的攻击力（不可叠加），持续2回合。

Spy_Fun1Des.En: Restores for 10% of Max Shadow Value, and then grants itself a 10% All DMG Bonus (Unstackable BUFF) for 2 rounds.
Spy_Fun1Des.Ch: 回复10%最大暗影值，并使自身造成伤害提高10%（不可叠加），持续2回合。

SB_Atk1Des.En: Attacks target by its sharp beak, deals 100% * ATK Physical DMG.
SB_Atk1Des.Ch: 使用锋锐的喙部攻击目标，造成攻击力100%的物理伤害。

SB_Fun1Des.En: Release once per 2 rounds. Randomly steals 2 random attributes from target's 10% current ATK, 20% Max HP, 20% Physical DEF, and 20% Magical DEF. The effect lasts until the end of the combat.
SB_Fun1Des.Ch: 每2回合固定释放1次。随机偷取目标10%当前攻击力，20%最大生命值，20%当前物理防御，20%当前魔法防御中的随机2种属性，偷取效果持续直至战斗结束。

SB_Fun2Des.En: Uses shadow to wrap each of its feathers and enter Secret Feather status. When being attacked under Secret Feather status, 33% chance to reduce the DMG of this attack by 40%. Secret Feather status lasts for 2 rounds.
SB_Fun2Des.Ch: 使用暗影包裹自身每一根羽毛，进入 秘羽 状态。秘羽 状态下，受到攻击时有33%概率使当次伤害降低40%。秘羽 状态持续2回合。

SB_Steal1.En: The Max HP of {0} is stolen

SB_Steal2.En: The Physical DEF of {0} is stolen

SB_Steal3.En: The Magical DEF of {0} is stolen

Status_FeatherAdd.En: Numerous Secret Feathers start to fly around the Monstrous Bird
Status_FeatherAdd.Ch: 数不清的神秘羽毛开始在怪鸟周围飞舞

WF_Atk1Des.En: Deals 100% * ATK Magical DMG. This DMG is increased by 10% for each 15% of the current Light Value below the Max Light Value, this effect is capped at 5 levels.
WF_Atk1Des.Ch: 造成攻击力100%的魔法伤害。当前光照值每低于最大光照值的15%, 该次攻击伤害都会提升10%，该效果最多计算5层。

WF_Fun1Des.En: Activates the fog to shroud the Lantern and reduce the Light Value Restore Amount at the start of the round by 50% (Unstackable DEBUFF) for 2 rounds.
WF_Fun1Des.Ch: 催动迷雾笼罩提灯，使回合开始时的光照值回复量降低50%（不可叠加），持续2回合。

WF_Fun2Des.En: Makes its body more solid and increase the Shadow Value Restore Amount by 5% (Stackable BUFF) for 2 rounds. This BUFF effect is added by 1% for each 15% of the current Light Value below the Max Light Value, this effect is capped at 3 levels.
WF_Fun2Des.Ch: 凝聚身形，使自身暗影值回复量提高5%（可叠加），持续2回合。当前光照值每低于最大光照值的15%，本次提供的增益效果都会增加1%，该效果最多计算3层。

WF_Fun3Des.En: Makes its body more empty, increasing the All DMG DEF by 20% (Unstackable BUFF), but its Shadow Value Reduce Resistance is also decreased by 20% (Unstackable DEBUFF), both effect last for 2 rounds.
WF_Fun3Des.Ch: 分散身形，使自身全伤害减免提高20%，但同时也使自身暗影值削减抵抗降低20%（不可叠加），增益与减益均持续2回合。

M_Atk1Des.En: Spits pungent liquid, dealing 100% * ATK Magical DMG. If the target is holding Corrupt Spore, each Corrupt Spore will deal an additional Magical DMG with the amount of 2% * target Max HP.
M_Atk1Des.Ch: 喷吐刺激性液体，造成攻击力100%的魔法伤害。若目标身上存在 腐败孢子，则每个 腐败孢子 会使本次技能额外造成目标最大生命值2%的魔法伤害

M_Fun1Des.En: Releases 5~10 Corrupt Spore, when restoring HP by using Lantern with Light Level 1 / 2 / 3, 50% / 65% / 80% chance to clear 1 Corrupt Spore. The Corrupt Spore lasts until the end of the combat.
M_Fun1Des.Ch: 向目标释放 5~10 个 腐败孢子。每次通过光照等级为 1/2/3 的提灯回复生命值时，有 50%/65%/80% 概率清除一个 腐败孢子。腐败孢子 持续直至战斗结束。

M_Fun2Des.En: Decreases the Heal Effect of target by 30% (Unstackable DEBUFF) for 2 rounds. If the target is holding Corrupt Spore, the number of Corrupt Spore will be increased by 50% (round up).
M_Fun2Des.Ch: 使目标的治疗效率降低30%（不可叠加），持续2回合。若目标身上存在 腐败孢子，还会使目标自身的 腐败孢子 数量增加50%（向上取整）。

M_Fun3Des.En: This skill is used only when its current HP decreases below 50% and 20% of Max HP for the first time. Devour all Corrupt Spore on the target and restore 2.5% of Max HP for each Corrupt Spore devoured.
M_Fun3Des.Ch: 当且仅当自身当前生命值首次低于最大生命值的50%或20%时使用该技能。吞噬目标身上所有 腐败孢子，每吞噬一个 腐败孢子，回复自身2.5%最大生命值。

M_Tell1.Ch: {0} 使用了 {1} 并激活了 {2} 层腐败孢子

M_Tell2.En: {0} used {1} and activated {2} Corrupt Spore proliferated
M_Tell2.Ch: {0} 使用了 {1} 并使腐败孢子增生了 {2} 层

M_Tell3.En: {0} sensed a crisis and devoured all {1} Corruption Spores and restored HP
M_Tell3.Ch: {0} 感受到了危机，吞噬了所有 {1} 层腐败孢子并回复了生命值

Status_SporeClear.En: All Corrupt Spores have been cleared
Status_SporeClear.Ch: 所有的腐败孢子已被清除

LC_Atk1Des.En: Launches a sparkling Magic Comet that deals 80% * ATK Magical DMG. 30% chance to spawn a Tiny Magic Comet that deals 65% * ATK Magical DMG.
LC_Atk1Des.Ch: 发射一枚闪耀的法术彗星，造成攻击力80%的魔法伤害。30%概率衍生一枚小型法术彗星，造成攻击力65%的魔法伤害。

LC_Atk2Des.En: Enters Magic Charge status and try to channel a powerful magical attack. In the end of Magic Charge status, dealing 150% * ATK Magical DMG. If the Magic Charge status is interrupted by Breakdown status, the uncontrolled magic energy deals 100% * ATK Magical DMG to itself and removes all BUFF gained from Afflatus. The Magic Charge status lasts for 1 round.
LC_Atk2Des.Ch: 进入 法术充能 状态并尝试引导一次强力的魔法攻击。法术充能 状态结束后，造成攻击力150%的魔法伤害。若 法术充能 状态被Breakdown状态中断，失控的魔法能量会对自身造成攻击力100%的魔法伤害，并清除所有来自 灵光乍现 的增益效果。法术充能 状态持续1回合。

LC_Fun1Des.En: Go through the contents of its mutilated text, and randomly select and inflict one of the following effects: increase its Physical DEF and Magical DEF by 12.5%; increase its ATK and All DMG DEF by 5%; increase its All DMG Bonus by 5%.
LC_Fun1Des.Ch: 翻阅自身残缺不全的文本内容，随机抽取并造成以下效果中的随机1个：使自身物理防御与魔法防御提高12.5%；使自身攻击力与全伤害减免提高5%；使自身全伤害提高5%。

LC_Combo.En: and made a Tiny Magic Comet combo
LC_Combo.Ch: 并造成了一次小型法术彗星连击

LC_Fun1Tell0.En: The Chapter increased Physical DEF and Magical DEF
LC_Fun1Tell0.Ch: 魔法章节的物理防御与魔法防御提高了

LC_Fun1Tell1.En: The Chapter increased ATK and All DMG DEF
LC_Fun1Tell1.Ch: 魔法章节的攻击力与全伤害减免提高了

LC_Fun1Tell2.En: The Chapter increased All DMG Bonus
LC_Fun1Tell2.Ch: 魔法章节的全伤害提高了

Status_LCChargeOn.En: {0} starts to charge a strong magical attack
Status_LCChargeOn.Ch: {0} 开始为一次强力法术攻击充能

Status_LCChargeInterrupt.En: The Magic Charge status of the Chapter has been successfully interrupted
Status_LCChargeInterrupt.Ch: 魔法章节的法术充能状态被成功中断了

Status_LCChargeOk.En: The Chapter completed the charge process and magic attack released
Status_LCChargeOk.Ch: 魔法章节的法术充能状态已完成并释放了强力魔法攻击

LC_BuffClear.En: All BUFF acquired from Afflatus are eliminated
LC_BuffClear.Ch: 魔法章节已失去所有来自灵光乍现的增益效果

NWS_Atk1Des.En: Deals 100% * ATK Physical DMG, 35% chance to increase ATK by 14% (Stackable BUFF) for 2 rounds.
NWS_Atk1Des.Ch: 造成攻击力100%的物理伤害，攻击后有35%概率提升自身攻击力14%，持续2回合，可叠加

NWS_Atk2Des.En: Deals 75% * ATK Physical DMG, if Dark Shield is existing when using this skill, an additional Physical DMG will dealt with the amount of 50% of current Shield Value.
NWS_Atk2Des.Ch: 造成攻击力75%的物理伤害，若释放该技能时自身存在 晦暗护盾，还会额外附加当前护盾值50%的伤害

NWS_Fun1Des.En: Activates the strength, grant a persistent Darkness Shield based on 20% of Max HP. When Darkness Shield is existing, the default Aggressive Desire is increased to 70%, All DMG Bonus is increased by 25%, and cannot be captured into Breakdown status. After the Darkness Shield is broken, enters Weakness status. When under Weakness status, the default Aggressive Desire is decreased to 20%, and ATK, Physical DEF, Magical DEF are decreased by 50%. The Weakness status lasts for 2 rounds.
NWS_Fun1Des.Ch: 激发力量，基于自身最大生命值的20%，为自身附加持续存在的 晦暗护盾。拥有 晦暗护盾 时，默认攻击欲望提高至70%，全伤害提高25%，且不会进入Breakdown状态。晦暗护盾 被击破后，陷入 虚弱 状态。处于 虚弱 状态中时，默认攻击欲望降低至20%，攻击力与双抗降低50%。虚弱 状态持续2回合。

NWS_Fun2Des.En: Consumes 20% of current Shadow Value and restore 10% of Max HP. If Darkness Shield is existing when using this skill, the Shield Value of Darkness Shield will also be restored by 5% of Max HP. If Weakness status is existing when using this skill, both the consume amount and restore effect will be decreased by 80%.
NWS_Fun2Des.Ch: 消耗当前暗影值的20%，回复最大生命值10%的生命值。若释放该技能时自身存在 晦暗护盾，还会同时为 晦暗护盾 回复自身最大生命值5%的护盾值。若释放该技能时自身处于 虚弱 状态，则消耗量与回复效果均降低80%。

NWS_Fun2Tell3.En: {0} in Weakness status used {1}, slightly restored health
NWS_Fun2Tell3.Ch: {0} 在虚弱状态下使用了 {1}, 小幅度回复了生命值

NWS_BKResis.En: Darkness Shield is in effect, {0} resisted Breakdown
NWS_BKResis.Ch: 晦暗护盾的效果使 {0} 抵制了Breakdown

NWS_ShieldOn.En: Northwell Shielder setted up Darkness Shield, dramatically increased Aggressive Desire and gained All DMG Bonus
NWS_ShieldOn.Ch: 诺斯维尔盾卫已展开晦暗护盾，显著提升了攻击欲望与全伤害

NWS_ShieldOff1.En: Northwell Shielder loses the protection from Darkness Shield, and entered Weakness status for 2 rounds
NWS_ShieldOff1.Ch: 诺斯维尔盾卫失去了晦暗护盾的保护，并进入了虚弱状态，持续2回合

SS_Atk1Des.En: Deals 100% * ATK Magical DMG, and additional Prisoned Light * 5 Magical DMG
SS_Atk1Des.Ch: 造成攻击力100%的魔法伤害，并附加 囚禁微光 * 5 的魔法伤害

SS_Atk2Des.En: Deals 75% * ATK Magical DMG, and additional shield with Prisoned Light * 10 Shield Value
SS_Atk2Des.Ch: 造成攻击力75%的魔法伤害，并为自身附加 囚禁微光 * 10 的护盾

SS_Fun1Des.En: Apply Light Cage to the target. While Light Cage is existing, at the start of each round, the Light Cage absorbs and imprisons 20% of current Light Value and converts it into Imprisoned Light. The Light Cage lasts for 5 rounds, and the Imprisoned Light will not disappear when Light Cage expires.
SS_Fun1Des.Ch: 为目标施加 光之囚笼。光之囚笼 存在时，每回合开始时回复光照值后，光之囚笼 都将吸收并囚禁当前光照值20%的光照值，并等额转化为 囚禁微光。光之囚笼 持续5回合，且消失后，囚禁微光 不会消失。

SS_Fun2Des.En: Enters Impurity Rise status and immediately assimilate 40% of Imprisoned Light. When under Impurity Rise status, assimilate 30% of Imprisoned Light before the action of each round. The Impurity Rise lasts for 2 rounds. If the Impurity Rise status is interrupted by Breakdown status, the Shadow Server will lose all Imprisoned Light. The lost Imprisoned Light will convert into Charge Value with 200% efficieny (randomly distributed among all Skill Stones), if all Skill Stones have reached to Max Charge Level, then switch to supply Light Value.{0} Assimilate: permanently increase ATK by (amount)%, and increase Physical DEF and Magical DEF by (amount * 2.5)%.
SS_Fun2Des.Ch: 进入 污浊飞升 状态，立即 同化 当前 囚禁微光 的40%。处于 污浊飞升 状态下时，每回合行动前，同化 当前 囚禁微光 的30%。污浊飞升 状态持续2回合。若 污浊飞升 状态被Breakdown状态中断，则会立刻失去所有 囚禁微光。失去的 囚禁微光 将以200%的效率倍转化为充能值（随机分配给所有技能石），若所有技能石均达到最大充能等级，则转为补充光照值。{0}同化：永久提升同化量*1%的攻击力，以及同化量*2.5%的物理防御和魔法防御。

SS_Assi.En: The Shadow Server assimilated {0} Light Value, permanently increased ATK, Physical DEF and Magical DEF
SS_Assi.Ch: 侍影者同化了 {0} 光照值，永久提升了攻击力、物理防御和魔法防御

Status_IRAdd.En: The Shadow Server enters Impurity Rise status, starts to keep to assimilate Imprisoned Light
Status_IRAdd.Ch: 侍影者进入了污浊飞升状态，开始持续同化囚禁微光

Status_IRInterrupt.En: The Impurity Rise has been successfully interrupted, all Imprisoned Light converted to power
Status_IRInterrupt.Ch: 污浊飞升状态被成功中断，囚禁微光尽数转化为了力量

Status_SSCageOn.En: The Shadow Server has weaved Light Cage
Status_SSCageOn.Ch: 侍影者已编织光之囚笼

Status_SSCageAdd.En: The Lantern has been covered by Light Cage
Status_SSCageAdd.Ch: 提灯已被光之囚笼笼罩

Status_SSCageOff.En: The Light Cage around Lantern faded away
Status_SSCageOff.Ch: 笼罩光之囚笼的提灯已消散

SE_Name.En: The Engraver of Shadow Skill Stone

SE_Pas1Des.En: Compared to other enemies, the Engraver has extremely high Max Shadow Value and Shadow Value Restore Amount, and will not affected by Breakdown mechanism.
SE_Pas1Des.Ch: 镌刻师拥有相比于其它敌人而言极高的最大暗影值与暗影值回复量，且不受Breakown机制的影响。

SE_Pas2Des.En: The Engraver releases attack and skill by consuming Shadow Value. Each time the Shadow Value is consumed, the amount of Shadow Value consumed will provide an equal amount of Charge Value for the Shadow Skill Stone, when the Shadow Skill Stone is fully charged, the Engraver will immediately release a strengthened version of attack or skill, and then clear the Charge Value of Shadow Skill Stone.
SE_Pas2Des.Ch: 镌刻师通过消耗暗影值来释放攻击与技能。每次消耗暗影值后，暗影值消耗量会为暗影技能石提供等额的充能值，当暗影技能石充能完毕后，镌刻师会立即释放一次攻击或技能的强化版本，随后暗影技能石的充能值清空。

SE_Atk1Des.En: Consumes 30% of current Shadow Value, dealing 50% * consumed amount + 50% * ATK Magical DMG{0}Strengthened version: deals Magical DMG with the amount of 20% * target Max HP.
SE_Atk1Des.Ch: 消耗30%当前暗影值，造成消耗量50%+攻击力50%的魔法伤害。{0}强化版本：造成目标最大生命值20%的魔法伤害。

SE_Atk2Des.En: Consumes 20% of current Shadow Value, dealing 50% * consumed amount + 50% * ATK Magical DMG, decreasing the Light Value Restore Amount of target by 30% (Unstackable DEBUFF) for 3 rounds.{0}Strengthened version: deals 150% * ATK Magical DMG and decrease the Shadow Value Reduce Effect of target by 50% (Unstackable DEBUFF) for 3 rounds.
SE_Atk2Des.Ch: 消耗20%当前暗影值，造成消耗量50%+攻击力50%的魔法伤害，并使目标光照值回复量降低30%（不可叠加），持续3回合。{0}强化版本：造成攻击力150%的魔法伤害，并使目标暗影值削减效率降低50%（不可叠加），持续3回合。

SE_Fun1Des.En: Consumes 25% of current Shadow Value, healing 100% * consumed amount HP, the healing amount will equally convert to Shield Value when over-healing is occurred.{0}Strengthened version: increases the All DMG DEF by 30% (Unstackable BUFF) for 3 rounds. Restores HP for 50% of current Shadow Value, the healing amount will equally convert to Shield Value when over-healing is occurred.
SE_Fun1Des.Ch: 消耗25%当前暗影值，为自身回复与消耗量等额的生命值，溢出的回复量将等额转化为护盾。{0}强化版本：使自身全伤害减免提高30%（不可叠加），持续3回合。根据当前暗影值的50%，为自身回复等额的生命值，溢出的回复量将等额转化为护盾。

SE_Fun2Des.En: Consumes 75% of current Shadow Value and 10% of current HP, record this consume amount of Shadow Value, and enter Engraving Mania status. When under Engraving Mania status, provide 50% * recorded consume amount Charge Value to Shadow Skill Stone before the action of each round, and when the Shadow Value is reduced, take True DMG equal to 5 * Shadow Value reduction. The Engraving Mania status lasts for 2 rounds.
SE_Fun2Des.Ch: 消耗75%当前暗影值与自身10%当前生命值，记录本次暗影值消耗量，并进入 镌刻术狂热 状态。处于 镌刻术狂热 状态下时，并在接下来两回合内，每回合行动前为暗影技能石提供本次暗影值消耗量50%的充能值，且当自身暗影值受到削减时，受到等同于暗影值削减量5倍的真实伤害。镌刻术狂热 状态持续2回合。

SE_Use.Ch: {0} 使用了 {1}，消耗了 {2} 暗影值

SE_Use1.En: {0} used {1}, consumed {2} Shadow Value and {3} HP
SE_Use1.Ch: {0} 使用了 {1}，消耗了 {2} 暗影值以及 {3} 生命值

SE_EnUse.Ch: {0} 使用了 {1} 的强化版本

SE_Charge.En: The Engraving Mania status charged Shadow Skill Stone by {0}
SE_Charge.Ch: 镌刻术狂热状态为暗影技能石提供了 {0} 充能值

Status_StoneAdd.En: Wait... Why does he have Skill Stone as well?
Status_StoneAdd.Ch: 等等... 为什么他身上也有技能石？

Status_EngraverAdd.En: The Engraver starts to charge his Skill Stone continuously within 2 rounds
Status_EngraverAdd.Ch: 镌刻师开始在2回合内持续为他的暗影技能石充能

Status_EngraverEnd.Ch: 镌刻术狂热状态已结束

MB_Pas1Des.En: The Raving Magic Book has 3 kinds of Spell Form, and its skills will gain different additional effects depending on the Spell Form. Each time degrade the Shadow Level, 10% chance to occur Force Switch; each time enter Breakdown status, 100% chance to occur Force Switch.{0}Force Switch: immediately swap the current Spell Form to a random other Spell Form, and clear all BUFF gained from Eruditeness in the previous Spell Form, and the magic energy of the Magic Book becomes disrupted and randomly charge the Skill Stone, with the Charge Value of 1.5 for each 5% of HP loss.
MB_Pas1Des.Ch: 狂言之魔典拥有三种法术形态，其技能将根据不同的法术形态获得不同的额外附加效果。每次降低暗影等级时，均有10%的概率触发 强制切换；每次进入Breakdown状态时，必定触发 强制切换。{0}强制切换：立刻改变当前法术形态至随机其它形态，清空上个法术形态下的所有来自 博览群籍 的增益，且魔典的法术能量会变得紊乱并随机为技能石充能，魔典每损失5%生命值，将提供1.5点充能值。

MB_Atk1Des.En: Launch 3~5 Magic Missiles, each Magic Missile deals 30% * ATK Magical DMG.{0}Spell Form - α: after each Magic Missile fired, 50% chance to generate an additional Associate Magic Missile, dealing 15% * ATK Magical DMG.{1}Spell Form - β: after each Magic Missile fired, restore HP based on 50% of the DMG of Magic Missile.{2}Spell Form - γ: after each Magic Missile fired, if the BUFF gained from Eruditeness is existing and in effect, extend a random BUFF among them by 1 round.
MB_Atk1Des.Ch: 发射3~5枚法术飞弹，每枚飞弹造成攻击力30%的魔法伤害。{0}法术形态-α：每发射一枚法术飞弹后，还有50%概率发射一枚伴生法术飞弹，造成15%攻击力的魔法伤害。{1}法术形态-β：每发射一枚法术飞弹后，基于造成伤害的50%，为自身回复相等的生命值。{2}法术形态-γ：每发射一枚法术飞弹后，若自身存在生效中的来自 博览群籍 的增益效果，则随机延长一个增益效果1回合。

MB_Atk2Des.En: Enters Magic Siphon status which lasts for 2 round, and cause the corresponding effect according to the current Spell Form at the end of Magic Siphon status.{0}Spell Form - α: releases powerful Magic Torrent, dealing 350% * ATK Magical DMG.{1}Spell Form - β: gain Starlight Shield with the Shield Value equal to 30% of Max HP. The Starlight Shield lasts for infinite rounds, and while it exists, the Shadow Value of Magic Book cannot be reduced.{2}Spell Form - γ: if the BUFF gained from Eruditeness is existing and in effect, double the value of them, otherwise, immediately release once Eruditeness.{3}If Shadow Level degraded during Magic Siphon status, delay the round in which the Magic Siphon is finished for 1 round (this effect can only be triggered once per Magic Siphon state). If Force Switch is triggered during Magic Siphon status, the Magic Siphon status will be interrupted, and increase the unit Charge Value in Force Switch from 1.5 to 3.0.
MB_Atk2Des.Ch: 进入持续2回合的 法术虹吸 状态，状态结束后将根据当前法术形态造成对应效果。{0}法术形态-α：释放强力魔法洪流，造成攻击力350%的魔法伤害。{1}法术形态-β：基于自身最大生命值的30%，获得星光护盾。星光护盾持续无限回合，且当其存在时，魔典的暗影值无法被降低。{2}法术形态-γ：若自身存在生效中的来自 博览群籍 的增益，则使所有增益的效果翻倍，否则立即释放一次 博览群籍。{3}法术虹吸 状态下若暗影等级降低，将延后 法术虹吸 完成的回合1回合（该效果在每次 法术虹吸 状态中只能触发一次）。法术虹吸 状态下若触发强制切换，将中断 法术虹吸 状态，并使 强制切换 中的单位充能值从1.5提升至3.0。

MB_Fun1Des.En: Immediately swap the current Spell Form to a random other Spell Form, keep all BUFF gained from Eruditeness in the previous Spell Form, and shorten every DEBUFF by 1 round.
MB_Fun1Des.Ch: 切换法术形态至不同于当前法术形态的随机一种，保留上一个法术形态中的来自 博览群籍 的所有增益，同时缩减所有减益效果1回合。

MB_Fun2Des.En: Go through the contents of its rich text containing countless magical knowledge, and randomly select and inflict two of the following effects: increase its Physical DEF and Magical DEF by 20%; increase its ATK by 10% and All DMG DEF by 7.5%; increase its All DMG Bonus by 10%.
MB_Fun2Des.Ch: 翻阅自身记载着丰富知识的文本内容，随机抽取并造成以下效果中的随机2个：使自身物理防御与魔法防御提高20%；使自身攻击力提高10%，全伤害减免提高7.5%；使自身全伤害提高10%。

MB_Atk1Tell.En: The Magic Book launched {0} Magic Missiles
MB_Atk1Tell.Ch: 魔典发射了 {0} 枚法术飞弹

MB_Atk1Tell1.En: The Magic Missile restored {0} HP of The Magic Book
MB_Atk1Tell1.Ch: 法术飞弹为魔典回复了 {0} 生命值

MB_Atk1Tell2.En: The Magic Missile generated an Associate Magic Missile
MB_Atk1Tell2.Ch: 法术飞弹衍生出了伴生法术飞弹

MB_Atk1Tell3.En: The Magic Missile randomly extended a BUFF for 1 round
MB_Atk1Tell3.Ch: 魔典已随机延长一个增益效果

MB_Fun1Tell.En: The Magic Book has shortened the duration of all DEBUFF
MB_Fun1Tell.Ch: 魔典已随机缩减一个减益效果

MB_Fun2Tell.En: The Magic Book read itself, increased <color=#FF8000>Physical DEF</color> and <color=#FF00FF>Magical DEF</color>
MB_Fun2Tell.Ch: 魔典阅读自身，物理防御与法术防御提高了

MB_Fun2Tell1.En: The Magic Book read itself, increased <color=#E6E6E6>ATK</color> and <color=#E6E6E6>All DMG DEF</color>
MB_Fun2Tell1.Ch: 魔典阅读自身，攻击力与全伤害减免提高了

MB_Fun2Tell2.En: The Magic Book read itself, increased <color=#E6E6E6>All DMG Bonus</color>
MB_Fun2Tell2.Ch: 魔典阅读自身，全伤害提高了

MB_BadSwitch.En: The Magic Book has lost all BUFF from Spell Form - {0}
MB_BadSwitch.Ch: 魔典已失去所有法术形态-{0}下的增益效果

MB_Switch.En: The Magic Book now is in: Spell Form - {0}
MB_Switch.Ch: 魔典当前的法术形态已变更为：法术形态-{0}

MB_Delay.En: The finish round of Magic Siphon status delayed
MB_Delay.Ch: 法术虹吸状态的完成回合已被延后1回合

MB_Starlight_SV.En: The Starlight Shield prevented the reduction of Shadow Value
MB_Starlight_SV.Ch: 星光护盾使魔典的暗影值无法被降低

Status_MBChargeOn.En: The Magic Book entered Magic Siphon status, starts to charge for a grand Magic Ritual
Status_MBChargeOn.Ch: 魔典进入了法术虹吸状态，开始为一次盛大的法术仪式充能

Status_MBInCharge.En: The Magic Book gathered huge amount of power......
Status_MBInCharge.Ch: 魔典汇聚了大量法术能量......

Status_MBChargeInterrupt.En: The Magic Siphon status of The Magic Book has been successfully interrupted
Status_MBChargeInterrupt.Ch: 魔典的法术虹吸状态已被成功中断

Status_MBChargeOk.En: Magic Siphon status completed, Magic Book's grand Magic Ritual is ready
Status_MBChargeOk.Ch: 法术虹吸状态已结束，魔典的盛大法术仪式已就绪

Status_MBCharge1.En: The Magic Book released powerful Magic Torrent
Status_MBCharge1.Ch: 魔典释放了强力法术洪流

Status_MBCharge2.En: The Magic Book is now protected by Starlight Shield
Status_MBCharge2.Ch: 魔典已被星光护盾笼罩

Status_MBCharge3.En: The Magic Book has doubled all BUFF from Eruditeness
Status_MBCharge3.Ch: 魔典的所有从博览群籍中获取的增益效果翻倍了

Knight_DSDes.En: Swing the sword, deal {0} * ATK physical DMG
Knight_DSDes.Ch: 挥出代表着自身信念的一剑，造成自身攻击力 {0} 的物理伤害

Knight_DSMustCrit.En: The Skill Stone: Determined Slash is brimming with power
Knight_DSMustCrit.Ch: 技能石：坚定挥斩正满溢着力量

Knight_BSDes.En: Based on {0} of Max HP, gain an equal amount of shield and enter the Holy Guard status. When being attacked under Holy Guard status, upgrade the Charge Level of Determined Slash by 1, making the next Determined Slash critical-assured, and reduce the CD of Light Blade by 1 round. If the shield is still existing when it expires, the remaining shield value will be converted equally to HP. Both shield and Holy Guard status last 1 round.
Knight_BSDes.Ch: 基于自身最大生命值的 {0}，获得等额的护盾并进入 神圣守卫 状态。处于 神圣守卫 状态下时若受到了攻击，则会提升 坚定挥斩 的充能等级 {1} 级，使下次 坚定挥斩 必定暴击，并使 圣光剑刃 的冷却缩减1回合。若护盾消失时仍未被击破，则剩余的护盾值会转化为等额的生命值。护盾与 神圣守卫 状态均持续1回合

Knight_LBDes.En: Infuse the sword with the power of light, during the current round, gain {0} levels of Sacred Blade. When holding Sacred Blade, each use of Determined Slash consumes 1 level of Sacred Blade, making the Determined Slash of this time does not consume Charge Value, reset Charge Level, or enter CD, and additionaly reduces the Shadow Value of enemy by {1}. If a critical Determined Slash is dealt during the round, 1 additional Sacred Blade will be added, this effect can only be triggered once. All Sacred Blade will disappear at the end of the round.
Knight_LBDes.Ch: 为剑中注入光之力量，在当前回合内，获得 {0} 层 神圣剑刃 效果。拥有 神圣剑刃 效果时，每次使用 坚定挥斩 后均会消耗一层 神圣剑刃 效果，使本次 坚定挥斩 不消耗充能值，不重置充能等级，不进入冷却，并额外削减怪物 {1} 点暗影值。期间若造成了暴击，还会使 神圣剑刃 效果额外增加1层，该效果至多触发1次。回合结束后，移除所有 神圣剑刃 效果。

Knight_LBOff.Ch: {0} 的剑刃上的光芒消散了

Knight_BlessShieldOn.En: {0} is now protected by Bless Shield
Knight_BlessShieldOn.Ch: {0} 正受到神圣护盾的保护

Knight_GuardTrigger.En: The Holy Guard status of {0} is triggered
Knight_GuardTrigger.Ch: {0} 的神圣守卫状态已触发

Mage_MODes.En: Generate a Magic Orb with the moonlight and attack the target, deal {0} * ATK Magical DMG and add {1} Moon Mark to the target.
Mage_MODes.Ch: 生成一个泛着月之光芒的法球并攻击目标，造成自身攻击力 {0} 的魔法伤害，并为目标施加 {1} 层 月之印记。

Mage_MADes.En: Summon the power of Luna, deal {0} * ATK Magical DMG, and then activate all Moon Mark on the target. If the target has no Moon Mark or the number of Moon Mark is less than 5, add 2 Moon Mark immediately; if the number of Moon Mark is more than 5, each Moon Mark will decrease the Magical DEF of target by {1} (Stackable DEBUFF) for 1 round.
Mage_MADes.Ch: 呼唤月之力量，造成自身攻击力 {0} 的魔法伤害，随后激活目标身上所有 月之印记。若目标身上不存在 月之印记 或 月之印记 数量小于5层，立刻施加2层 月之印记；若目标身上的 月之印记 数量大于等于5层，每层 月之印记 将使目标的魔法防御降低 {1}（可叠加），持续1回合。

Mage_FMDes.En: Release an ancient Lunar Spell from Dalom, deal {0} * ATK Magical DMG. If the target has Moon Mark, consume all Moon Mark and each consumed Moon Mark will increase the Critical Rate and Critical DMG of this skill by 5% and 10%, respectively. If this skill deals critical DMG, restore HP by 25% * DMG. If more than 6 Moon Mark are consumed in once, increase Light Value Restore Amount by 30% (Stackable BUFF) for 2 rounds.
Mage_FMDes.Ch: 发动来自达洛姆的古老月亮法术，造成自身攻击力 {0} 的魔法伤害。若目标身上拥有 月之印记，则会消耗所有 月之印记，每消耗1层 月之印记，将会使本次技能的暴击率提高5%，暴击伤害提高10%。若该技能造成了暴击，则回复暴击伤害25%的生命值。若一次性消耗了至少6层 月之印记，还会使自身光照值回复量提高30%（可叠加），持续2回合。

Mage_FMLightValue.Ch: 众多月之印记的力量使光照值回复量提高了
